name: Pirate Bay (Chilled)
description:
How to open the game:

1: Open 'Game' folder

2: Open 'Release' folder

3: Open ' TowerDefence.exe'

4: Enjoy

How to play the game:

1: Click on Difficulty

2: Write a name in the text field to the rights

3: Select a difficulty

4: When the game starts, hold left mouse button down

5: Drag the mouse over a tower to place it.

All rights reserved! DO NOT USE ANY CODE OR ASSETS (Images etc)!
